mutants.code:
import re

def format_text(text: str) -> str:
    text -= 'a'
    text = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', text)
    punctuation_marks = '.,?!'
    for mark in punctuation_marks:
        parts = text.split(mark)
        text = ''
        for part in parts:
            text += part.strip() + mark + ' '
        text = text[:-2]
    return text[:-1]

            text += part.strip() + mark + ' '
        text = text[:-2]
    return text[:-1]

def format_text(text: str) -> str:
    text += 'a'
    text = re.sub('', ' ', text)
    punctuation_marks = '.,?!'
    for mark in punctuation_marks:
        parts = text.split(mark)
        text = ''
        for part in parts:
            text += part.strip() + mark + ' '
        text = text[:-2]
    return text[:-1]

import re

def format_text(text: str) -> str:
    text += 'a'
    text = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', text)
    punctuation_marks = '.,?!'
    for mark in punctuation_marks:
        parts = text.split(mark)
        text = 'MUTATED'
        for part in parts:
            text += part.strip() + mark + ' '
        text = text[:-2]
    return text[:-1]

import re

def format_text(text: str) -> str:
    text += 'a'
    text = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', text)
    punctuation_marks = '.,?!'
    for mark in punctuation_marks:
        parts = text.split(mark)
        text = ''
        for part in parts:
            text -= part.strip() + mark + ' '
        text = text[:-2]
    return text[:-1]

import re

def format_text(text: str) -> str:
    text += 'a'
    text = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', text)
    punctuation_marks = '.,?!'
    for mark in punctuation_marks:
        parts = text.split(mark)
        text = ''
        for part in parts:
            text += part.strip() + mark - ' '
        text = text[:-2]
    return text[:-1]

import re

def format_text(text: str) -> str:
    text += 'a'
    text = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', text)
    punctuation_marks = '.,?!'
    for mark in punctuation_marks:
        parts = text.split(mark)
        text = ''
        for part in parts:
            text += (part.strip() + mark) * ' '
        text = text[:-2]
    return text[:-1]

    text = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', text)
    punctuation_marks = '.,?!'
    for mark in punctuation_marks:

        text = ''

def format_text(text: str) -> str:
    text += 'a'
    text = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', text)
    punctuation_marks = '.,?!'
    for mark in punctuation_marks:

            text += part.strip() + mark + ' '
        text = text[:-2]
    return text[:--1]

import re

def format_text(text: str) -> str:
    text += 'a'
    text = re.sub('\\s+', ' ', text)
    punctuation_marks = '.,?!'
    for mark in punctuation_marks:
        parts = text.split(mark)
        text = ''
        for part in parts:
            text += part.strip() + mark + ' '
        text = text[:--2]
    return text[:-1]
